name: Air Raid Medic!
description:
Chaos reigns as you dodge bullets, bombs, and barbed wire in an effort to save your fallen allies before it's too late!

The game currently contains two modes - 'Infinite Survivor' and '3 Men Left Behind'.

NOTE: For best performance, Google Chrome or Microsoft Edge is recommended

Controls:

  • HOLD SPACEBAR while over a wounded person to heal them
  • Use the LEFT and RIGHT ARROW KEYS to move
  • Use the UP ARROW KEY to jump
  • Press P to pause and access the in-game menu
